meanings.definition: A solid figure with many plane faces, typically more than three.
meanings.sent1: I learned about different polyhedrons in my geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The dice we use in board games are examples of polyhedrons.
meanings.sent3: The polyhedron on the table looked like a colorful puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex polyhedron, with each thought a different face.
meanings.sent5: The crystal polyhedron sparkled in the sunlight, mesmerizing everyone who saw it.
